snippet.title: Alex's Hope Trailer
snippet.description:
Alex's Hope is one of the two stories included in our upcoming visual/kinetic novel Alex's Hope & Alex's Solitude. Wishlist it on Steam now at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2537750/Alexs_Hope__Alexs_Solitude/

Learn more about Violet Horizons and how Alex's Hope ties in to our next game, Alex's Journey to the Grave, on our website: https://violethorizons.com/
